sen.j: 建仁3年（1203年）、父の全成は甥で二代将軍の源頼家と対立して殺害されるが、この時は母方の祖父北条時政や伯母の北条政子の尽力もあって連座を免れ、父の遺領である駿河国阿野荘に隠棲した。
sen.e: In 1203, his father Zenjo was killed due to the conflict between his nephew who was the 2nd shogun, MINAMOTO no Yoriie, but with the help of his grandfather on the mother's side, Tokimasa HOJO, and aunt Masako HOJO, he was able to escape the complicity and live in seclusion.
